titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CLINICAL COMMISSIONING GROUP ELIGIBILITY DECISION OUTCOME COMMUNICATED TO PATIENT DATE (NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE STANDARD) - Description

div.p: CLINICAL COMMISSIONING GROUP ELIGIBILITY DECISION OUTCOME COMMUNICATED TO PATIENT DATE (NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE STANDARD) is the same as attribute ACTIVITY DATE where the ACTIVITY DATE TYPE is National Code ' Clinical Commissioning Group Eligibility Decision Outcome Communicated To Patient Date (NHS Continuing Healthcare Standard) '
